channel.title: General Forward Bloggin on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Forward Bloggin on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: blog blog blog... i am so kinda sleepy and tired of blogging for a minute
item.description: When i have more time and less mess in my head i imagine i will be more apt to blog. i miss the days of the casual blog. ok. enough. i need to move forward.
